Flow.description: Build feature bulk handover for OOO with review changes. With Bulk Notification. Update Bulk Handover Maximum Selection.

formulas.description: Formula to determine if case owner email is coming from a queue or user
formulas.name: CaseOwnerEmailFormula

formulas.description: Based on the field Case Owner Formula but without the hyperlink, to be used in text template to display the case owner (user vs queue)
formulas.name: CaseOwnerFormula
forUpdateAllowHandover
formulas.expression: IF(ISNULL({!varCaseCount}), IF({!recordId.AllowHandover__c} = TRUE, FALSE, TRUE), IF( {!Loop_Cases_Bulk_Handover.AllowHandover__c} = TRUE, FALSE, TRUE) )

formulas.description: Depending on whether the owner of the case is a user or a group, we show a different name field
formulas.name: NewCaseOwner

fields.name: ExceptionText
fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: FlipRecordTypeDescription
fields.fieldText:
These taxonomy values don't belong to this Case Record Type, would you like to change the Record Type of this Case?

More information on different Record Types can be found on Hub.


Current RecordType: {!recordId.RecordType.Name}

Proposed RecordType: {!GetNewTeam.RecordType.Name}

fields.name: FlipRecordTypeChoice
fields.fieldText: RecordType

screens.description: If no queue is found, show an error message
screens.name: No_Queue_Retuned_Screen
screens.label: No Queue Retuned Screen

value.stringValue: No valid queue could be determined by the system. Please contact a system administrator to resolve this issue.

screens.description: If no queue is found, show an error message
screens.name: NoQueueRetunedScreen
screens.label: No Queue Retuned Screen

value.stringValue: No valid queue could be determined by the system. Please contact a system administrator to resolve this issue.

fields.name: HandoverErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: {!ErrorMessage}

fields.name: ErrorNewStatusDisplay
fields.fieldText: When the Case status is 'New' you can only reroute the case when handover reason is 'Case Wrongly Assigned Or Routed'.

fields.name: escalatedReasonHandover
fields.fieldText: You can not use 'Escalated' reason on non-escalated case. You have to start the Escalation process first.

fields.name: ReassignInfoText
fields.fieldText: Please review the following information. The case will be rerouted based on the values entered here.

fields.name: PopulateHandoverInformationInfoScreen
fields.fieldText: Please select the new case owner and review the following information.

fields.name: NewOwnerIsTeam
fields.fieldText: New Owner is a Team

fields.name: bulkHandoverCases
fields.fieldText: Bulk Handover Cases

fields.name: NewOwnerChoice
fields.fieldText: New Owner

fields.name: InputInternalComment
fields.fieldText: Internal Comment
fields.helpText: Give a clear explanation why you wrote this comment, this comment is for internal use only.

fields.name: NotifyTheNewOwner
fields.fieldText: Notify The New Owner
fields.helpText: The new owner of the case will receive a bell notification to inform them that the case is handed over to them. In the event of a Bulk handover the new User will always be notified.

fields.name: TaxonomyHelpText
fields.fieldText: In the event of a Bulk handover the Taxonomy will not be bulk updated.

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: 7 OR (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6) AND NOT (4 AND 5)

fields.name: inputOverrideTaxonomy
fields.fieldText: I can't complete the taxonomy, but I do know what team should handle the case.

fields.name: resultMessage
fields.fieldText: Press finish to hand the case over with the following values.

fields.name: outputResult
fields.fieldText:
Type: {!recordId.Type}

Sub-Type: {!recordId.SubType__c}

Topic: {!recordId.ServiceTopic__c}

Owner: {!NewCaseOwner}

fields.name: ZendeskCollabText
fields.fieldText:
You have selected a team that is not yet migrated to Salesforce.

A new Zendesk ticket will be created and this Salesforce case will stay open with you as the owner. You are responsible to update and complete this Salesforce case, while your colleague is responsible for the Zendesk ticket.


Press Next to continue, or previous to select a different owner.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_ZendeskCollabText
fields.fieldText:
You have selected a team that is not yet migrated to Salesforce.

You cannot handover responsibility for this case using this handover reason, please select a different owner or choose a different handover reason. Until you do, you are responsible to update and complete this Salesforce case.


Press Previous to go back.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ZendeskCollabText
fields.fieldText:
You have selected a team that is not yet migrated to Salesforce.

A new Zendesk ticket will be created and this Salesforce case will be closed automatically. You do not have any further responsibilities to complete this Salesforce case, while your colleague is responsible for the Zendesk ticket.


Press Next to continue, or Previous to go back.

textTemplates.name: BulkNotificationTitle
textTemplates.text: Bulk Handover: {!varCaseCount} Cases. Please check your Open Cases.

textTemplates.name: HandoverToastMessage
textTemplates.text: The case {!recordId.CaseNumber} has been handed over.

textTemplates.name: ZendeskCollabEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
This Zendesk ticket was created from a Salesforce case by a colleague that is already working from Salesforce. The original Salesforce case is still open & will be completed by the colleague in Salesforce. You are now responsible to update and complete this Zendesk ticket.


Contextual case details:

Requester Account: {!recordId.Account.Name}

Requester Email Address: {!recordId.SuppliedEmail}

Requester Name: {!recordId.ContactName__c}

Salesforce Case Number: {!recordId.CaseNumber}

Previous Agent: {!CaseOwnerFormula}, {!CaseOwnerEmailFormula}

Original Ticket Description: {!recordId.Description}

Internal Comment: {!InputInternalComment}

Zendesk Ticket URL: {{ticket.url}}

Additional CCs: {{ticket.ccs}}

Last Public Comment: {{ticket.latest_public_comment_html}}

textTemplates.name: ZendeskCollaborationInternalComment
ZendeskTransferEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
This Zendesk ticket was created from a Salesforce case by a colleague that is already working from Salesforce. The original Salesforce case has been closed & you are now responsible to update and complete this Zendesk ticket.


Contextual case details:

Requester Account: {!recordId.Account.Name}

Requester Email Address: {!recordId.SuppliedEmail}

Requester Name: {!recordId.ContactName__c}

Salesforce Case Number: {!recordId.CaseNumber}

Previous Agent: {!CaseOwnerFormula}, {!CaseOwnerEmailFormula}

Original Ticket Description: {!recordId.Description}

Internal Comment: {!InputInternalComment}

Additional CCs: {{ticket.ccs}}

Zendesk Ticket URL: {{ticket.url}}

Last Public Comment: {{ticket.latest_public_comment_html}}

textTemplates.description: Internal comment to be posted on the case when the case is transferred to Zendesk
textTemplates.name: ZendeskTransferInternalComment

variables.description: Record variable to hold the Case record that the Flow is launched from.
variables.name: recordId
